Title: U raskoraku
Actors: Dragomir Bojanic-Gidra, Gizela Vukovic, Dusan Janicijevic, Gojko Santic
Plot: An activist in the years of reconstruction, while saving cooperative carts, breaks his spine, becomes disabled and forced to fight for survival. Instead of ruling on his disability, around which he consistently files complains, he gets the medal and becomes the hero of a television show, which brings a number of far-reaching consequences for the author of the show and the main character.
